abstract: Six stories from members of Melbourne's Legacy.
description: Six members of Melbourne Legacy give their individual stories of how they got into contact with Legacy. Whether they are survivors of war, employees of Legacy or the children of soldiers, Legacy manages make a significant impression on the lives of its members and provides inspiration for future generations.
